org.gbif.registry.ws.resources

Class BaseNetworkEntityResource<T extends org.gbif.api.model.registry.NetworkEntity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.registry.ws.resources.BaseNetworkEntityResource<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of resource that is under CRUD
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.gbif.api.service.registry.CommentService, org.gbif.api.service.registry.ContactService, org.gbif.api.service.registry.EndpointService, org.gbif.api.service.registry.IdentifierService, org.gbif.api.service.registry.MachineTagService, org.gbif.api.service.registry.NetworkEntityService<T>, org.gbif.api.service.registry.TagService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatasetResource, InstallationResource, NetworkResource, NodeResource, OrganizationResource

    public class BaseNetworkEntityResource<T extends org.gbif.api.model.registry.NetworkEntity>
extends Object
implements org.gbif.api.service.registry.NetworkEntityService<T>
    Provides a skeleton implementation of the following.
    • Base CRUD operations for a network entity
    • Comment operations
    • Contact operations (in addition to BaseNetworkEntityResource)
    • Endpoint operations (in addition to BaseNetworkEntityResource)
    • Identifier operations (in addition to BaseNetworkEntityResource2)
    • MachineTag operations
    • Tag operations
